courseSpec.title: Python Programming for Complete Beginners
courseSpec.audience: Anyone with no prior programming experience
courseSpec.goal: Learn Python fundamentals and write simple programs
courseSpec.teachingStyle: Patient, step-by-step explanations with lots of practice

blueprint.courseDescription: A gentle introduction to programming using Python, designed for absolute beginners with no prior coding experience.
learningObjectives: Understand basic programming concepts like variables and data types
Write simple Python programs to solve everyday problems
Use conditional statements to make decisions in code
Create and use functions to organize code
Work with lists and loops to process data
